# context_tool

ContextTool interface for LLM interactions with context.

This module defines interfaces for tools with context that can be used by LLMs during a
call. ContextTools are defined using the `@tool(deps_type=...)` decorator which creates
a `ContextToolDef`. When an LLM uses a tool during a call, a `Tool` instance is created
with the specific arguments provided by the LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/context_tool/index" symbolName="ToolOutput" /> ToolOutput

Tool output content for a message.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/context_tool/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/context_tool/index" symbolName="BaseTool" /> BaseTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="tools/context_tool/index" symbolName="ContextToolDef" /> ContextToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="tools/context_tool/index" symbolName="ContextTool" /> ContextTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.
